item.title: CVE-2020-1325|2024-08-04T06:32:00.465Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server%202019%20update%201.1
item.description: Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Services Spoofing Vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2020-0815|2024-08-04T06:18:03.190Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server%202019%20update%201.1
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Services improperly handle pipeline job tokens, aka 'Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Services Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0758.
